channel.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
channel.description:
Yesterday I ordered one piece of Axoloti Core. Payed with PayPal. Checked afterwards to see if the payment was done. Yes, the transfer was made on the address of johannes.taelman@gmail.com. Checked with my bank account and the money were sent. Then I checked out the axoloti website and it says that my order state is "cancelled" (?!). I wrote about the problem to the address I made the payment to on PayPal, to johannes.taelman@gmail.com, attaching the image with the page that says that the order is "cancelled", and the recipe of the payment, but I got no answer. Please help me with some advice, if anybody knows where else to address this problem. If Johannes Taelman is reading this, please check the email, my order is #4275, placed on September 23 2019. ______________________
26 september 2019 EDIT:
The cancelled order is 4275, though the PayPal receipt states "Invoice ID: WC-4276". So if anybody is trying to solve this, might check on both order numbers; might be that 4275 was cancelled by me because one credit card was not accepted by Pay Pal, but still, I payed with another card, and the transaction was sucessful. If this is the case, the (successful) order #4276 doesn't appear in my account, only #4275, that is cancelled.
______________________
BTW, there are at least two problems with the axoloti website:
1. On the buying page is written that it is possible to order paying directly by card if you don't have a PayPal account, but actually there is no such option. 2. There is at least very difficult, if not impossible, to login into the axoloti website to see your order status. There is no login button. The only way to login is to make an order, go to the checkout page, and there is an option to login, but after that you have to let the order uncompleted. Still not sure if logging in to the community (this) website, keeps you logged in to the axoloti website, and if it does, how do you get to "my account" page afterwards, to see your order status.
Thank you, Dragos Andriana.

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @dragosandriana dragos andriana
item.description:
@dragosandriana wrote:

Case solved.
Thank you everybody for reply.
Thank you Johannes Taelman for building this!
Board received, me happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @sennomo
item.description:
@sennomo wrote:

I've had a variety of problems with PayPal. I avoid using it whenever possible, but it's sometimes the only option.

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @axoman
item.description:
@axoman wrote:

I can't imagine Johannes would have cancelled your order, but it's definitely not unusual to have to wait for a reply from King Axo himself due to how busy he is with all this stuff.

Anyway, sorry you're left in the dark for now, but hopefully not for too long.

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @dragosandriana dragos andriana
item.description:
@dragosandriana wrote:

I have no idea, I just followed the procedure.
I'm sure it must be a logical answer, but even so, the simplest way would be for Johannes to check the order number, PayPal balance or bank account or whatever, to see if the transfer was made.
Is a DIY analog remedy, but hey, this is an analog to digital / digital to analog board after all, right?

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @axoman
item.description:
@axoman wrote:

Seems odd that your order was cancelled. I've never read of anyone having their order cancelled before I read of yours!

Perhaps it's PayPal problem

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @dragosandriana dragos andriana
item.description:
@dragosandriana wrote:

Thank you for the fast reply, weasel79.
Actually I don't worry about the money, I worry that I won't receive the board!

Read full topic
item.source: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help

item.title: Issue with Axoloti Core order #4275, please help
item.dc:creator: @weasel79 blender
item.description:
@weasel79 wrote:

Hey man,
sorry to hear about your issues, johannes can be pretty bad at communicating but i don't think you have to worry about your money. I am sure you will receive your axoloti and eventually even hear from johannes at some point. It just seeems like everything takes a little longer these days.

Read full topic
